bibl.title: The Epigraphe or Harvest Tax in the Apollonopolite Nome.

series.title: Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten. Vlaamse Kennis- en Cultuurforum

bibl.note: I. Name of the tax. - II. The tax areas and the thesauroi of the Apollonopolite nome. - III. The formulas in the grain tax receipts and the tax officials. - Pp. 113-122: Table. Ptolemaic grain tax receipts from the Apollonopolite nome.

bibl.title: Edfu, an Egyptian Provincial Capital in the Ptolemaic Period. Brussels, 3 September 2001

bibl.seg: VANDORPE Katelijn, The Epigraphe or Harvest Tax in the Apollonopolite Nome.

Katelijn VANDORPE and Willy CLARYSSE (Edd.), Edfu, an Egyptian Provincial Capital in the Ptolemaic Period. Brussels, 3 September 2001 = Koninklijke Vlaamse Academie van België voor Wetenschappen en Kunsten. Vlaamse Kennis- en Cultuurforum (Brussel, 2003) pp. 107-122, 1 tabl.

I. Name of the tax. - II. The tax areas and the thesauroi of the Apollonopolite nome. - III. The formulas in the grain tax receipts and the tax officials. - Pp. 113-122: Table. Ptolemaic grain tax receipts from the Apollonopolite nome.
